name: scanner
effect: May be traded to Captain Stern for a deep sea tooth or a deep sea scale.
short_effect: Trade to Captain Stern for a DeepSeaTooth or DeepSeaScale.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A device found inside the ABANDONED SHIP.
flavor_text.emerald: A device found inside the ABANDONED SHIP.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A device used to search for life-forms in water. It looks too difficult to use.
